<ns1:findMiscellaneousReceipt xmlns:ns1="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/financials/receivables/receipts/shared/miscellaneousReceiptService/commonService/types/">
<ns1:findCriteria xmlns:ns2="http://xmlns.oracle.com/adf/svc/types/">
<ns2:filter>
<ns2:conjunction>And</ns2:conjunction>
<ns2:group>
<ns2:conjunction>And</ns2:conjunction>
<ns2:upperCaseCompare></ns2:upperCaseCompare>
<ns2:item>
<ns2:conjunction>And</ns2:conjunction>
<ns2:upperCaseCompare></ns2:upperCaseCompare>
<ns2:attribute>CashReceiptId</ns2:attribute>
<ns2:operator>=</ns2:operator>
<ns2:value>400411</ns2:value> /* This is the value returned by the create operation */
</ns2:item>
</ns2:group>
</ns2:filter>
</ns1:findCriteria>
</ns1:findMiscellaneousReceipt>
</soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <typ:processReverseReceipt> /*This worked and Reversed all 4 receipts in this payload*/
        <typ:changeOperation>Create</typ:changeOperation>
          <typ:reverseReceipt>
            <!-- <com:ReceiptNumber>BDS001_PP_GMNY</com:ReceiptNumber> /*Completely Unapplied*/ -->
            <com:ReversalCategory>REV</com:ReversalCategory>
            <com:ReversalDate>2024-09-04</com:ReversalDate>
            <com:ReversalReasonCode>WRONG AMOUNT</com:ReversalReasonCode>
            <com:ReversalComments>Testing Reversal via SOAP</com:ReversalComments>
            <com:BusinessUnit>Germany Business Unit</com:BusinessUnit>
            <com:ReceiptId>300000257875097</com:ReceiptId>
         </typ:reverseReceipt>
         <typ:reverseReceipt>
            <!-- <com:ReceiptNumber>BDS008UC</com:ReceiptNumber> /*Partially Applied*/ -->
            <com:ReversalCategory>REV</com:ReversalCategory>
